package.name: sphinx
package.summary: Client extension for Sphinx - opensource SQL full-text search engine
package.description: This extension provides bindings for libsphinxclient, client library for Sphinx.
package.notes: - Added support for open(), close(), status() and setOverride() available in sphinx 0.9.9 new API

configureoption.name: with-sphinx
configureoption.prompt: Please provide the installation prefix of libsphinxclient

release.notes: - Fixed crash when extending class doesn't call parent constructor.
- Fixed build failure with PHP 5.1.x. - Added support for setSelect(), available in sphinx 0.9.9 new API (patch by Olivier Poitrey)

- Added __sleep() and __wakeup() methods to prevent (un)serialization of SphinxClient instances. - Fixed PECL bug #15033 (segfaults on SPARC because of unaligned read). - Fixed PECL bug #14930 (configure fails on freebsd). (patch by nobleclem at fatalexception dot us) - Fixed PECL bug #14752 (32-bit Client does not work with 64-bit ids). (nobleclem at fatalexception dot us, Tony)

- Updated SphinxClient::updateAttributes() to return number of updated attributes on success. - Updated SphinxClient::setIDRange() to accept integers, not floats. - Updated SphinxClient::addQuery() to return integer on success.
